text: Since my brother was a kid, he had difficulties with his homeworks and work at school in general. My parents were and still are very busy so they can't always help him with his homeworks and they don't have the money to buy him a personal teacher. So, I was designed to help him. First, him and I weren't very happy to work together because he didn't want to work and I was also very busy with my own homework or I was doing something else. So I was a little bit forced to help him. Weeks passed but I didn't have any news about my brother's homeworks and marks but he was more happy to do his homeworks and my parents weren't angry about his marks. While I was again helping him, he told me that he was way better than before at school. Moreover, he also said that I made him enjoy school. While he was better at school, I was starting to enjoy helping him and I was saying to myself that I wanted to make these moments with my friend my job. According to me, my brother is the person who made me want to be a teacher. I also starting to help my friends and that makes me sure that I want to be a teacher.
